sn21.3:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn21.3:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahamoggallano rajagahe viharanti veluvane kalandakanivape ekavihare.
sn21.3:1.4: Atha kho ayasma sariputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma mahamoggallano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahamoggallanena saddhim sammodi.
sn21.3:1.5: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
sn21.3:2.2: parisuddho mukhavanno pariyodato santena nunayasma mahamoggallano ajja viharena vihasi”ti.
sn21.3:2.4: Api ca me ahosi dhammi katha”ti.
sn21.3:2.5: “Kena saddhim panayasmato mahamoggallanassa ahosi dhammi katha”ti?
sn21.3:2.6: “Bhagavata kho me, avuso, saddhim ahosi dhammi katha”ti.
sn21.3:2.7: “Dure kho, avuso, bhagava etarahi savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn21.3:2.8: Kim nu kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavantam iddhiya upasankami;
sn21.3:2.9: udahu bhagava ayasmantam mahamoggallanam iddhiya upasankami”ti?
sn21.3:2.12: Api ca me yavata bhagava ettavata dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibba ca sotadhatu.
sn21.3:2.13: Bhagavatopi yavataham ettavata dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibba ca sotadhatu”ti.
sn21.3:2.14: “Yathakatham panayasmato mahamoggallanassa bhagavata saddhim ahosi dhammi katha”ti?
sn21.3:3.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, araddhaviriyo hoti’ti?
sn21.3:3.4: Evam vutte, mam, avuso, bhagava etadavoca:
sn21.3:3.6: kamam taco ca nharu ca atthi ca avasissatu, sarire upassussatu mamsalohitam, yam tam purisathamena purisaviriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbam na tam apapunitva viriyassa santhanam bhavissatiti.
sn21.3:3.8: Evam kho me, avuso, bhagavata saddhim ahosi dhammi katha”ti.
sn21.3:4.1: “Seyyathapi, avuso, himavato pabbatarajassa paritta pasanasakkhara yavadeva upanikkhepanamattaya;
sn21.3:4.2: evameva kho mayam ayasmato mahamoggallanassa yavadeva upanikkhepanamattaya.
sn21.3:4.3: Ayasma hi mahamoggallano mahiddhiko mahanubhavo akankhamano kappam tittheyya”ti.
sn21.3:5.1: “Seyyathapi, avuso, mahatiya lonaghataya paritta lonasakkharaya yavadeva upanikkhepanamattaya;
sn21.3:5.2: evameva kho mayam ayasmato sariputtassa yavadeva upanikkhepanamattaya.
sn21.3:5.3: Ayasma hi sariputto bhagavata anekapariyayena thomito vannito pasattho:
sn21.3:7.1: Itiha te ubho mahanaga annamannassa subhasitam sulapitam samanumodimsuti.
